ai.summary: An easy 3.6 km woodland loop in the UK, suitable for families and casual walkers. A flat, well-marked trail through mixed woodland with tranquil scenery and occasional muddy patches after rain.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently rolling forest path. Mostly packed dirt with some exposed roots and occasional muddy patches, especially after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Weather in the UK can change quickly. Wear sturdy, waterproof footwear and dress in layers. Carry a map or device with offline maps and a charged phone. Stay on marked paths and tell someone your planned route and return time. Bring water and a small snack. Be mindful of ticks and insects in woodland; check after your walk. Take care in busy periods as other walkers or cyclists may use the same trail.
recommended_gear: Map or offline maps on a device
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly April–October) offer the best weather and scenery, though the trail is walkable year-round with appropriate gear for winter conditions.

seo.title: Feshie Woodland Trail – Easy 3.6 km Forest Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the 3.6 km easy Feshie Woodland Trail in the UK. Family-friendly forest path with flat terrain, wildlife, and peaceful woodland scenery.
